questions.question: During a model training session, you notice that your training job is taking significantly longer than expected. Which of the following actions should you take to correctly set up SageMaker Profiler for this task?
options: Add SageMaker Profiler start and stop commands in the training script to collect system resource metrics like CPU and GPU utilization.
Define custom debug rules to monitor vanishing gradients and early stopping criteria during training.
Use SageMaker Model Monitor to track and visualize the training job's input data distribution changes.

correct_answers: Add SageMaker Profiler start and stop commands in the training script to collect system resource metrics like CPU and GPU utilization.
